char_1035_wisdel.name: 好礼
char_1035_wisdel.descCN: 攻击时为主目标附着残影，残影受到维什戴尔的余震影响时有15%概率爆炸，对周围所有敌人造成120%攻击力的物理伤害并使其<$ba.stun>晕眩</>0.5秒
char_1035_wisdel.desc: When attacking attach an Afterimage to target. When the Afterimage is hit by Wis'adel's aftershocks, 15% chance to explode and deal 120% ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>stunning</> for 0.5 seconds

char_1035_wisdel.name: 好礼
char_1035_wisdel.descCN: 攻击时为主目标附着残影，残影受到维什戴尔的余震影响时有15%概率爆炸，对周围所有敌人造成130%<@ba.talpu>（+10%）</>攻击力的物理伤害并使其<$ba.stun>晕眩</>0.5秒
char_1035_wisdel.desc: When attacking and attach an Afterimage to target. When the Afterimage is hit by Wis'adel's aftershocks, 15% chance to explode and deal 130%<@ba.talpu>(+10%)</> ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>stunning</> for 0.5 seconds

char_1035_wisdel.name: 好礼
char_1035_wisdel.descCN: 攻击时对主目标的攻击力提升至115%并为其附着残影，残影受到维什戴尔的余震影响时有15%概率爆炸，对周围所有敌人造成150%攻击力的物理伤害并使其<$ba.stun>晕眩</>1秒
char_1035_wisdel.desc: When attacking, deal 115% ATK as Physical damage and attach an Afterimage to target. When the Afterimage is hit by Wis'adel's aftershocks, 15% chance to explode and deal 150% ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>stunning</> for 1 seconds

char_1035_wisdel.name: 好礼
char_1035_wisdel.descCN: 攻击时对主目标的攻击力提升至115%并为其附着残影，残影受到维什戴尔的余震影响时有15%概率爆炸，对周围所有敌人造成160%<@ba.talpu>（+10%）</>攻击力的物理伤害并使其<$ba.stun>晕眩</>1秒
char_1035_wisdel.desc: When attacking, deal 115% ATK as Physical damage and attach an Afterimage to target. When the Afterimage is hit by Wis'adel's aftershocks, 15% chance to explode and deal 160%<@ba.talpu>(+10%)</> ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>stunning</> for 1 seconds

char_1035_wisdel.name: 死魂灵的余息
char_1035_wisdel.descCN: 部署后立刻在攻击范围内召唤一个魂灵之影，在魂灵之影周围时获得<$ba.camou>迷彩</>
char_1035_wisdel.desc: On deployment, summon a Shadow of Revenant within Attack Range. When near a Shadow of Revenant, gain <$ba.camou>Camouflage</>

char_4133_logos.name: 语汇演化
char_4133_logos.descCN: 对一个目标发起攻击时，有40%几率额外对攻击范围内一个随机目标造成相当于攻击力40%的法术伤害
char_4133_logos.desc: When attacking, 40% chance to attack another random target within Attack Range, dealing 40% ATK as Arts damage

char_4133_logos.name: 语汇演化
char_4133_logos.descCN: 对一个目标发起攻击时，有40%几率额外对攻击范围内一个随机目标造成相当于攻击力45%<@ba.talpu>（+5%）</>的法术伤害
char_4133_logos.desc: When attacking, 40% chance to attack another random target within Attack Range, dealing 45%<@ba.talpu>(+5%)</> ATK as Arts damage

char_4133_logos.name: 语汇演化
char_4133_logos.descCN: 对一个目标发起攻击时，有40%几率额外对攻击范围内一个随机目标造成相当于攻击力60%的法术伤害并使其<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>0.8秒
char_4133_logos.desc: When attacking, 40% chance to attack another random target within Attack Range, dealing 60% ATK as Arts damage and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> them for 0.8 seconds

char_4133_logos.name: 语汇演化
char_4133_logos.descCN: 对一个目标发起攻击时，有40%几率额外对攻击范围内一个随机目标造成相当于攻击力65%<@ba.talpu>（+5%）</>的法术伤害并使其<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>0.8秒

char_4133_logos.name: 剜魂具辞
char_4133_logos.descCN: 攻击使目标在5秒内法术抗性-10且受到的法术伤害提高150点
char_4133_logos.desc: Attacks inflict -10 RES to target for 5 seconds and recieved addition 150 Arts damage

char_4133_logos.name: 剜魂具辞
char_4133_logos.descCN: 攻击使目标在5秒内法术抗性-10且受到的法术伤害提高165<@ba.talpu>（+15）</>点
char_4133_logos.desc: Attacks inflict -10 RES to target for 5 seconds and recieved addition 165<@ba.talpu>(+15)</> Arts damage

char_4134_cetsyr.name: 过往尘埃
char_4134_cetsyr.descCN: 魔王周围持续围绕3枚“微尘”，“微尘”碰撞友方干员时，消失并使该干员受到魔王特性效果提升至1.2倍，持续6秒，消失的“微尘”在6秒后重生
char_4134_cetsyr.desc: 3 "Fine Dust" continually revolve around Civilight Eterna. When the "Fine Dust" hits an ally, it disappears and increases the Trait effect that ally to 1.2 times for 6 seconds. Disappeared "Fine Dust" will reappear in 6 seconds

char_4134_cetsyr.name: 过往尘埃
char_4134_cetsyr.descCN: 魔王周围持续围绕3枚“微尘”，“微尘”碰撞友方干员时，消失并使该干员受到魔王特性效果提升至1.5倍，持续6秒，消失的“微尘”在6秒后重生
char_4134_cetsyr.desc: 3 "Fine Dust" continually revolve around Civilight Eterna. When the "Fine Dust" hits an ally, it disappears and increases the Trait effect that ally to 1.5 times for 6 seconds. Disappeared "Fine Dust" will reappear in 6 seconds

char_4134_cetsyr.name: 魔王残响
char_4134_cetsyr.descCN: 上阵时，所有友方单位受到【萨卡兹】敌人的伤害降低10%
char_4134_cetsyr.desc: When deployed, reduce damage taken by all allies from [Sarkaz] enemies by 10%

char_4134_cetsyr.name: 魔王残响
char_4134_cetsyr.descCN: 上阵时，所有友方单位受到【萨卡兹】敌人的伤害降低15%<@ba.talpu>（+5%）</>
char_4134_cetsyr.desc: When deployed, reduce damage taken by all allies from [Sarkaz] enemies by 15%<@ba.talpu>(+5%)</>

char_4136_phonor.name: 悠远河谷的齐唱·I
char_4136_phonor.descCN: 部署后40秒内攻击附带45点凋亡损伤，并使攻击范围内的所有敌人受到3%的<$ba.magicfragile>【法术脆弱】</>和<$ba.elementfragile>【元素脆弱】</>
char_4136_phonor.desc: For 40 seconds after deployment, PhonoR-0's attacks deals 45 <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>. Additionally, PhonoR-0 inflicts 3% <$ba.magicfragile>[Arts Fragility]</> and <$ba.elementfragile>[Elemental Fragility]</> to all enemies within Attack Range

char_1036_fang2.desc: During the first deployment, DP Cost -2. After retreat, the next Operator DP Cost -1

char_1037_amiya3.name: 诚挚期许
char_1037_amiya3.descCN: 在场时所有友方单位最大生命+5%，技能期间所有友方单位每秒恢复1.5%最大生命
char_1037_amiya3.desc: When deployed, increase all allies' Max HP by 5%. When skill is active, all allies recover 1.5% Max HP every second
